name: Kullu
description: Known as the 'Valley of Gods', Kullu is a picturesque district in Himachal Pradesh famous for its scenic beauty, apple orchards, and adventure sports. The district is home to the famous Kullu Dussehra festival and offers numerous trekking trails and camping sites.
summary: A paradise for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts

locations.name: Manali
locations.description: A popular hill station known for its snow-capped mountains, adventure sports, and vibrant culture.

locations.name: Rohtang Pass
locations.description: A high mountain pass offering breathtaking views and snow activities throughout the year.
locations.address: Rohtang Pass, Kullu District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Solang Valley
locations.description: Adventure sports hub offering skiing, paragliding, and zorbing activities.
locations.address: Solang Valley, Kullu District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Hadimba Temple
locations.description: Ancient wooden temple dedicated to Hadimba Devi, surrounded by cedar forests.
locations.address: Hadimba Temple Road, Manali, Kullu District

locations.name: Naggar Castle
locations.description: Historic castle with stunning views of the Kullu Valley and art gallery.
